instructions: Do any of the following: Open a channel feed: Touch and hold a story, then tap Go to Channel. Or tap a story in the Today feed, then tap the channel name at the top of the story. Open a topic feed: Tap the topic title Movies or Travel, for example. At the top of the feed, do any of the following: Follow: Tap the Follow button . Unfollow: Tap the More button , then tap Unfollow Channel or Unfollow Topic. Block: Tap the More button , then tap Block Channel or Block Topic. Unblock: Tap the More button , then tap Unblock Channel or Unblock Topic.
Tap Today. Touch and hold a headline, then tap Suggest More Like This or Suggest Less Like This.
Tap Today. Tap the More button in a channel or topic group, then tap Stop Suggesting.
